xml:
Gynest<tm tmtype="reg"/> Indications and dose

Improve the vaginal epithelium in menopausal atrophic vaginitis (short-term use)

By vagina

  • Adult

    Apply 1 applicatorful daily until improvement occurrs, dose to be applied preferably in the evening, reduced to 1 applicatorful twice weekly, attempts to discontinue should be made at 3–6 month intervals with re-examination.

 Conception and contraception

May damage latex condoms and diaphragms.
Clinical medicinal product information Clinical medicinal product information
